name: disaster_events_impact_location
title: Disaster Events with Category Impact and Location (point)

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Australia (CC BY 3.0 AU)

abstract: This dataset contains all Australian Emergency Management Knowledge Hub disaster events, including disaster category, impacts and geographic co-ordinates, between 1753 and 2014. For more information visit the Australian Government Data Portal.
